entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 70%
